short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to manage your video and shorts consumption.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I recently found myself mindlessly scrolling through YouTube, consuming countless videos and shorts without realizing how much time I was spending. That’s when I decided to take control and create a tool to help me—and others—become more aware of our viewing habits.

This lightweight, intuitive tool tracks the number of videos and shorts you watch each day, empowering you with valuable insights. By providing real-time data and actionable features, it helps you break free from unintentional binge-watching and regain control over your time. Take charge of your habits and make intentional choices—one video at a time.
